name: AS Performance HLP-D 68
description: AS Performance HLP-D 68 is a detergent and dispersing hydraulic oil based on mineral oil with highly effective additives to reduce wear. Can be used universally in all hydraulic systems, even under the most difficult conditions. In hydraulic systems subject to high thermal loads with high-pressure pumps of all types, in sensitive control systems, for supplying small gears and for use in circulating systems.
